thread.title: Tester warns Montanans about consequences of U.S. debt default (Jon Tester)
thread.title_full: Tester warns Montanans about consequences of U.S. debt default (Jon Tester) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Tester warns Montanans about consequences of U.S. debt default (Jon Tester)
text: ( Source : Jon Tester ) ( U.S. Senate ) - Senator Jon Tester is warning that if Congress fails to raise the debt ceiling, Montanans ' wallets could be seriously affected. Tester today called on Congress to raise the debt ceiling before November 3
